heading: Welcome New Members (weekly)
description: Copy this post and use this weekly to welcome the new members of your group
text:
Hey everyone 👋 
Welcoming all of you to <Facebook group name>
Do share a small introduction about you which helps the members know you better 🙌

Feel free to ask any questions you have

heading: Weekly Promotion Day post
description: Use this post when you have the weekly promotion day in your group
text:
Hey everyone 👋 

Today is our weekly promotion day 🎺

Please feel free to share links of whatever businesses you are working on along with description and how it can benefit the group members 

Also share if you have any special discounts for the community members

heading: Weekly Jobs Day post
description: Use this post when you have the weekly jobs day in your group
text:
Hey everyone 👋 

Today is our weekly jobs day 👨‍💻

Please feel free to share if you are hiring for any positions in your companies. Do share the link of the job posting and a small description of the role. These can be full time, remote, part-time, freelance or work from home roles.

Also share a small introduction about your company along with link so that the community members can get complete information

heading: Group Guidelines post
description: Use this post every 3 months to share the latest group guidelines with the entire community
text:
Hey everyone 👋 

Just sharing the group guidelines with everyone. It would be great for everyone to just browse through them. We are an awesome and impactful community today because all of us follow the group guidelines religiously 🙏 

< Paste group guidelines >

heading: Regular #Askforhelp post
description: Do this regularly to enable your members to ask for any help if they need from the community
text:
Hey everyone 👋 

Time for our regular #AskforHelp post. 

All community members who need help from fellow community members can please share what help they need exactly and relevant community members can answer and solve.

Please be mindful any comment/conversation asking for money will be deleted and the member will get a stern warning.
